title: Friend lost his account
body:
Hi guys,

Wondering if someone can help me out.

My friend has a Gold account. He hasn't played in months. He tried logging in recently, he cannot.

We suspect he's forgotten either his username or password.

When he signed up, he suspects he signed up using a bogus or throw-away email address.

Assuming he cannot access his email for the typical account retrieval process, is there any other way he can get his account back?

replies.body:
His only real chance is an Account Recovery ticket through support. They'll ask a whole bunch of questions about the account and if he can answer enough of them they should be able to work something out. I don't know how the process goes with so much missing login info but it's worth a shot.

The questions are just a guide, so you can give them other info that's helpful as well as. Basically anything that is unique to the account but not visible on it. Could be things like, I bought x skin on release day, I bought x champion when they dropped to 6300, I transferred regions at roughly this time and so on and so forth.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
